mapper.delete: delete from ebook_shelf where ebook_name = #{ebookName} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into ebook_shelf(user_id,ebook_name, ebook_category, ebook_size, ebook_read, ebook_page) values (#{userId},#{ebookName}, #{ebookCategory}, #{ebookSize}, #{ebookRead}, #{ebookPage})
mapper.select: select count(user_id) from ebook_shelf where user_id = #{userId} and ebook_name = #{ebookName}
